arch:property.oc:show_val: In the center of Trench 88 between Locus 9 the entry level platform for the west cryptoporticus in the south and Locus 12 the entry level landing platform from the Colonnaded Street.
Opening elevation: At Sub Datum #2, located on lower (most south) Step #1, 1.20 m from the East Wall Locus 7 or at 891.998 m the Locus 9 Landing Platform.
Landing platforms Loci 9, 12, and Walls Loci 3, 6, and 7.
With all the construction wall loci of this Trench 88. Loci 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 12, and 13.
2.40 m north south-by-3.80 m east west width in the south.

There are seven sandstone steps leading from the Colonnaded Street entry to the Locus 9 upper Platform. It may be that their risers were also decorated with colorful stucco as we found that although most of the stucco had fallen away, there was still a base coat on the riser surface. These steps rise 0.24 higher than the north side of the platform, which may indicate a secondary flooring over the platform which no longer exists. Step #1 is 0.655 m in width-by-0.265 m in riser height. Step #2 is 0.445 m in width-by-0.215 in height; Step #3 is 0.45 m in width-by-0.245 m in height. Step #4 is approximately 0.43 m in depth-by-0.272 m in height. Step #5 is 0.372 m in width-by- 0.237 m in height. Step #6 is 0.36 m in width-by-0.27 m in height. Step #7 is 0.365 m in width-by-0.29 m in height. All of these measurements have been averaged between two to three readings. There is at least a 0.03 m plaster backing in the rear of each of these steps, which indicates that the risers were plastered.
Closing Elevation: At the opening elevation of Locus 12, the entry landing platform 890.204 m.
Lower Stairs, leading from the Locus 13 Colonnaded Street Entry Threshold and Locus 12 Landing Platform up to the south to the Locus 9 Landing from the West Propylaeum Entry Landing Platform Locus 9
